name: GirlsCraft 2k17 Creative
description:
Girls Craft 2K17 Creative - a game that will change the understanding of cubic sandboxes with the craft. Unleash your imagination to implement all the ideas and creative works!

Build your figures, houses, shopping centers, restaurants, cafes, hair salons, jewelry stores and much more. At your disposal is a very big automatically generated map, a set of interior will create comfort and atmosphere in your world!

Launch game and begin to create your world from a variety of beautiful squares and harvested items: flowers, painting, kitchen, a bedroom, a desk with a computer and more.


- Added in-game settings.
- Unique character selection.
- Completely free game for kids and adults.
- A variety of inhabitants, from superheroes with superabilities up cute princesses with Elsa and Anna.
- Mobile edition includes new locations in the "Township" mode.
